SELECT DISTINCT ift.ID,ift.SALE_ORDER_NO,ift.PNR_NO AS PNR,de.NAME AS DEPNAME,sm.NAME AS MODIFIERNAME,cps.NAME AS COMPNAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SM_USER s WHERE s.LOGIN_NAME = ift.CREATOR) AS CUSTOMERNAME,ift.LOCKER,ISOD.`STATUS` FROM IFT_SALE_ORDER_EXT ift LEFT JOIN IFT_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL ISOD ON ift.SALE_ORDER_NO = ISOD.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN SM_USER sm ON sm.ID = ift.LOCKER LEFT JOIN SM_DEPT de ON de.ID = sm.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN CPS_CUSTOMER cps ON cps.CUSTOMER_NO = de.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN OS_SALEORDER o ON ift.SALE_ORDER_NO = o.SALE_ORDER_NO
ORDER BY ${sort}

SELECT DISTINCT ift.ID,ift.SALE_ORDER_NO,ift.PNR_NO AS PNR,de.NAME AS DEPNAME,sm.NAME AS MODIFIERNAME,cps.NAME AS COMPNAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SM_USER s WHERE s.LOGIN_NAME = ift.CREATOR) AS CUSTOMERNAME,ift.LOCKER,ISOD.`STATUS` FROM IFT_SALE_ORDER_EXT ift LEFT JOIN IFT_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL ISOD ON ift.SALE_ORDER_NO = ISOD.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN SM_USER sm ON sm.ID = ift.LOCKER LEFT JOIN SM_DEPT de ON de.ID = sm.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN CPS_CUSTOMER cps ON cps.CUSTOMER_NO = de.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN OS_SALEORDER o ON ift.SALE_ORDER_NO = o.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN OS_BUYORDER aa ON ift.SALE_ORDER_NO = aa.SALE_ORDER_NO /*WHERE ift.CREATE_TYPE IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 6) AND o.PAY_STATUS IN (3, 4) AND ift.LOCKER != 0 AND aa.BUY_CHILD_STATUS IN (1, 2)*/
ORDER BY ${sort}
